basics.name: Sara El Bouch
basics.label: Post-doctoral Researcher
basics.summary: Post-doctoral Reasearcher in signal processing, Navigation Radar and Remote sensing team, ISAE-Supaero

work.name: ISAE Supaero
work.summary: Post-doctoral reseach in the group Navigation, Radar and Remote Sensing. I work on estimation and detection theory in signal processing with a focus on asymptotic performance of algorithms

teaching.name: ISAE Supaero
teaching.summary: Digital Signal processing courses (TD/TP), Random signal processing courses (TD/TP)

teaching.name: Grenoble-INP Phelma
teaching.summary: 156 hours of C programming, Data Science for Geoscience, Image processing

supervision.name: GIPSA-Lab
supervision.summary: I supervised a six-month internship of an Engineer student on the use of Machine learning theory for detecting weak seismic activity

awards.title: Grenoble-INP Alumni Award: Best Engineer Internship
